name: HASAGI
description:
Level 2 Student Team / First JAM

We tried to mix a runner with guitar hero gameplay, well it looks more like a qte game...
but at least we tried and we had a good time ! 

Press A / Q to kill Zombie / Green Orb
Press Z / W to kill Spider / Red Orb
Press E / E to kill Knight / Blue Orb
Press Space to use superpower.
